name: autocomplete-js
author: support@autocomplete-js.com
description: autocomplete.js is a fast and lightweight autocomplete library, without any dependencies.

scripts.css-prod: lessc src/autocomplete.less dist/autocomplete.min.css && cleancss -o dist/autocomplete.min.css dist/autocomplete.min.css
scripts.js-prod: browserify src/autocomplete.ts --standalone=AutoComplete -p [ tsify ] -p [ minifyify --no-map ] -p browserify-header > dist/autocomplete.min.js
scripts.build-dev: mkdir -p dist && npm run css-dev && npm run js-dev
scripts.build-prod: mkdir -p dist && npm run css-prod && npm run js-prod
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-dev && npm run build-prod
